EmailTemplate.description: US-0018713 [AU] Coupon Click Contract Templates to be sent to AU Sellers | US-0010476 - AU Coupon email template content update
EmailTemplate.name: AU Coupon Contract Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Coupon Contract | {eBaySellerID} | {Coupon_ID__c} | {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_Start_Date__c} | {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_End_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {eBaySellerID},
This email is to offer You, the opportunity to actively participate in an upcoming coupon offer on eBay. The promotion will have a unique redemption code, terms and conditions, timings and may also be targeted to specific eBay customers.
This promotion will start on {CouponStartDate} {CouponStartTime} and end on {CouponEndDate} {CouponEndTime}, subject to the Coupon Terms and Conditions set out below. The Seller funding rate for this promotion is {SellerFundingRate%}.
To Participate:
Please review the Coupon Term Sheet and Master Agreement which govern your participation in the promotion and are available here: Coupon Terms and Conditions.
To accept the offer click on "I AGREE" below the Master Agreement. Please note you will need to accept offer by {ContractDueDate}. If you do not accept by this date, eBay reserves the right to exclude you from this coupon offer.
You will receive an email confirming your participation within 1 day of acceptance.
If you have any further questions, please kindly revert back to retailpromotions@ebay.com.
Thank You
Retail Promotions Team
eBay Australia
